name: credible_uncertain_post
description: checks the post and flags as credible uncertain
condition: post.avg_stance_support > 0.3 && post.avg_stance_support < 0.4 && avg_stance_query < 0.2 && avg_stance_deny < 0.2 && avg_stance_comment >0.4 && post.misinfome_credibility_value > -0.33 && post.misinfome_credibility_value <= 0.33 && post.misinfome_credibility_confidence > 0.5
